distractors_added.location: setBridgeRouter() function changing bridgeRouter address and previewRouterCall() external view helper performing low-level staticcall for diagnostics

_updateMessageStats() and _computeLatencyScore() internal functions plus totalMessagesProcessed, totalRouterCalls, averagePayloadSize, lastObservedRoot, messageLatencyScore fields implementing message and router analytics
getMessageStatus() and getRouterStatistics() view functions exposing derived analytics without affecting process() validation

actual_vulnerability.location: process() function and _messageRoot() helper where message validation continues to rely solely on acceptedRoot and the derived root

notes: Trojan Horse transformation adds router configuration, diagnostics, and detailed message analytics around the original bridge processing flow while keeping the message validation behavior and state transitions in process() unchanged.
